amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase energy conservation program funding by $2 million and reduce Bureau of Land Management Public Domain Forestry Program funding by $4.6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in the Congressional Record of July 8, 1997, to reduce the Bureau of Land Management's land and resources management account by $4.7 million and increase funds for energy conservation programs comensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutierrez amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
